video_prompt: Two anime women, one's hair subtly shifting and eyes twinkling, the other dynamically posing, hand on hip, leg bending, foot pressing into the first. Text and emblems on clothing subtly shimmer as a strong blue background pulsates.
image_prompt: Generate an anime-style image of two fashionable women against a vibrant blue background. The foreground left features a bust-up of a woman with long, silver hair, golden-brown eyes, and glossy pink lips, wearing a pearl earring and a silver necklace over a white t-shirt with a rose emblem. Overlapping her, on the right, is a full-body depiction of another woman with long, wavy dark brown hair, wearing an oversized white t-shirt with "ARILET ALAVAE" text and a red rose emblem, black shorts with a blue stripe, and white high-top sneakers. She is dynamically posed, with one foot resting on the first woman's chest. Emphasize a clean, digital art aesthetic with delicate features and large eyes.
refined_video_prompt: One woman's hair subtly shifts, her eyes twinkling. The other dynamically adjusts her pose, her leg bending as her foot presses into the first. Text and emblems on their clothing subtly shimmer while a strong blue background pulsates.
